Html:
Will there be a VS2012 & MVC 4 update soon?

This sample store seems to be using many of the older technologies for example in the Membership and Authorization.

Yes, there's a separate branch in the source code for the ASP.NET MVC 4 release: http://mvcmusicstore.codeplex.com/SourceControl/BrowseLatest

The docs are nearly done, should be posted soon.

From: freejelly
Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2012 12:13 AM
To: Jon Galloway
Subject: VS2012 & MVC 4 update? [mvcmusicstore:402980]

From: freejelly

Will there be a VS2012 & MVC 4 update soon?

This sample store seems to be using many of the older technologies for example in the Membership and Authorization.

It's great to see you using SimpleMembership but seems like there's not a lot to see - very black-boxy. Hoping the write-up goes into deeper detail re: features/usage of SM cuz there sure doesn't seem to be much coverage of it - which seems strange given how fundamental of a feature it is.

And same can be said for the new Session object.

thx much
Jon - thanks so much for updating this tutorial.  It's really great.
How do you get the tutorial for for this one?
